oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Vitamin D and K Status Influences Bone Mineral Density and Bone Accrual in Children and Adolescents with Celiac Disease
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mager, Diana
Turner, Justine
Qiao, Jing
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The study objective was to determine the interrelationships between vitamin K/D status and lifestyle variables on bone mineral density) in children and adolescents with celiac disease at diagnosis and after 1 year on the gluten-free diet.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Medicine, Health and Life Sciences
nutrition
pediatrics
gluten-free diet
vitamin d
vitamin k
bone mineral density
cohort studies
celiac disease
oai_dc:dc.dc:type: BMD data; Anthropometric data, dietary and physical activity; Biosamples
